ack.p: We thank all the staff of the Vila Central Hospital for their support and help during the study period. We also thank Kalkie Sero, Senior Scientist at the Vila Central Hospital Laboratoy and Public Health Surveillance Unit, Ministry of Health for data on Zika and Chikungunya prevalence. Finally, we thank Dr. John Waitumbi, Lab Research Director, Molecular Biology/Immunology. USAMRD-A/K for proof reading the manuscript and providing detailed feedback.
